segments.text: What do you want to eat for breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All I usually have is some cereal for breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know that breakfast is the most important meal of the day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I sometimes run late in the morning , and can't make breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me what you eat in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just eat some oatmeal , toast , and orange juice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a great breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's good , and it's easy to make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a very quick meal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , are you still going to have cereal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'm going to make myself some oatmeal and toast .
segments.speaker: S2
